sen.j: 仏光寺通（ぶっこうじどおり）は、京都府京都市の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: The Bukkoji-dori Street is an east-west running street in Kyoto City.
The Bukkoji-dori Street is a street running east-west in Kyoto.
The Bukkoji-dori Street is a street running east-west in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 平安京の五条坊門小路にあたる。
sen.e: It corresponds to the Gojo-bomon-koji Street in Heiankyo.
It corresponds to the Gojo-bomon-koji Street in Heiankyo.
It corresponds to the Gojo-bomon-koji Street in Heiankyo.

sen.j: 東は鴨川 (淀川水系)右岸堤防から西は佐井西通まで、綾小路通と高辻通の間を走る。
sen.e: It runs from the right bank of the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa water system) in the east to the Sainishi-dori Street in the west between the Ayanokoji-dori Street and the Takatsuji-dori Street.
It runs from the right bank of the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa water system) in the east to the Sainishi-dori Street in the west between the Ayanokoji-dori Street and the Takatsuji-dori Street.
It runs from the right bank of the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa water system) in the east to the Sainishi-dori Street in the west between the Ayanokoji-dori Street and the Takatsuji-dori Street.

sen.j: 東新道から仲町通にかけて小規模な商店街を作る。
sen.e: The section between the Higashi-Shin-michi street and the Nakamachi-dori Street constitutes a small scale shopping district.
A small scale shopping district constitutes the section between Higashi-Shin-michi Street and Nakamachi-dori Street.
A small scale shopping district constitutes the section between Higashi-Shinmichi Street and Nakamachi-dori Street.

sen.j: 名称は、天正14年（1586年）に移転してきた佛光寺の北に面することに由来する。
sen.e: Its name originates from Bukko-ji Temple, north edge of which the street ran after the relocation of the temple (1586).
Its name originates from the fact that it faced the north edge of Bukko-ji Temple after the relocation of the temple (1586).
Its name originates from the fact that it faced the north edge of Bukko-ji Temple after the relocation of the temple (1586).

sen.j: 近世までは現在の高辻通を仏光寺通と呼び、仏光寺通を旧称の五条坊門通と呼ぶこともあった。
sen.e: Until modern times some called the Takatsuji-dori Street Bukkoji-dori Street, while the current Bukkoji-dori Street was called Gojo-bomon-dori Street--its former name..
Until modern times some called the Takatsuji-dori Street Bukkoji-dori Street, while the current Bukkoji-dori Street was called Gojo-bomon-dori Street--its former name..
